Eric Moe

Bite Sized Web Projects

Some weird typographic web experiments. Contains whales.—6 April 2017

I have accumulated a bunch of low key web projects that I thought would look great on one page. You can always checkout my CodePen if you like this kind of stuff!

Interaction Design

The following projects came from my Interaction I class at UT Austin. Most of these projects gravitated toward web typography, which remains an interesting pursuit.

Signature

See the Pen Signature by Eric Moe (@geomoetric) on CodePen.

See the Pen Lyrics by Eric Moe (@geomoetric) on CodePen.

See the Pen Markup styles by Eric Moe (@geomoetric) on CodePen.

See the Pen Typesetting by Eric Moe (@geomoetric) on CodePen.

See the Pen Pixel Perfect Exercise by Eric Moe (@geomoetric) on CodePen.

Free Code Camp

These pens come from my summer of freeCodeCamp. I worked through the Responsive Web Design certificate in beta, and I’m still working through the Javascript section. Most of these had a lot of criteria attached, but I still found them pretty interesting!

Tribute Page

See the Pen FCC Tribute Page by Eric Moe (@geomoetric) on CodePen.
